io.micronaut.serde.support

Class DefaultSerdeRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.serde.support.DefaultSerdeRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeserializerLocator, NamingStrategyLocator, SerdeRegistry, SerializerLocator

    @Singleton
public class DefaultSerdeRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements SerdeRegistry
    Default implementation of the SerdeRegistry interface.
